name: Tailored HTML
author: Ryan Bakerink

sections.description:
Tailored HTML 1.0 is a great way to dynamically control content for authenticated / unauthenticated users.

You can apply your configurations to pages/posts via ShortCode or Widgets.

Arbitrary section

Visit our website at https://www.datasprings.com/wordpress/plugins/tailored-html and download our Tailored HTML User Guide.
sections.installation:
If Tailored HTML was downloaded through WordPress:

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  2. Begin configuring Tailored HTML by going to Settings -> Tailored HTML after the plugin has been installed.

If Tailored HTML was downloaded from www.datasprings.com

  1. After you have downloaded “ds-tailored-html.zip” from Data Springs go to your WordPress site(while logged in as an admin).
  2. Go to Plugins -> Add New -> and click the “Upload Plugin” button at the top-left of this page.
  3. You’ll be taken to a page where you can upload the .zip that you downloaded. After uploading this .zip, click the “Install Now” button.
  4. Tailored HTML should have been installed. If you had any issues, please contact us at wordpress@datasprings.com. Please note, it may take 1-2 business days to review and provide you a response.
sections.faq:
I’m having issues installing Tailored HTML. What should I do?

Contact us at wordpress@datasprings.com. We appreciate the opportunity to assist you. Please note, it may take 1-2 business days to review and provide you a response.

Where can I find documentation on Tailored HTML?

Review the Tailored HTML User Guide

How do I receive assistance with Tailored HTML?

Data Springs offers 2 tiers of support for Tailored HTML.

  • Standard Support($19 per year)
  • Premium Support($49 per year)

If you would like to learn more or subscribe to one of our annual support plans, please visit our Support Page

I like your product but I need it to work a little differently, how can Data Springs help?

Data Springs can be of assistance with your WordPress development needs. Please submit your project ideas/requests to wordpress@datasprings.com and we’ll provide you a response within 1-2 business days.

I would like to provide a donation to Data Springs, where can I submit a donation?

Please submit all Tailored HTML donations at this page: Donate to Tailored HTML

Tailored HTML is not our only WordPress plugin under development. By receiving donations it boosts our development moral.
sections.changelog:
1.0

Tailored HTML has just been released. There have been no patches/hot fixes applied.
